name: Cloudbot - Skybound (East Coast Student Jam - 2022)
description:
A 3d platformer where you can make your own platformers.

This game was made for the 2022 East Coast Student Jam.

4 unique levels were made with hard variants after.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Move Camera: Mouse or Left and Right Arrow Keys

Shoot Clouds: Left Click or Up Arrow Key

Suck up Clouds: Right Click or Down Arrow Key

Help/Techniques:

To collect some clouds at the beginning of a level  right click / use the up arrow key  in front of a cloud dispenser.

After shooting a cloud you can either jump on it or suck it back up.

Need a larger cloud? just hold the shoot button to shoot out more than 1.

While on a cloud you can still shoot out another one to chain clouds together to increase distance.

The amount of clouds you can have in each level is different, for instance in level 2 you can only carry 1 cloud.
